name: Smart Indoor Parking System
description: An IoT-enabled system for efficient parking management.
details: This project uses sensors, microcontrollers, and cloud integration to optimize parking space usage in real-time. The system can be accessed via a mobile app for both users and owners.

name: Portfolio Website

details: A responsive portfolio showcasing projects, blogs, and contact details, built using modern frontend technologies.

name: Security System
description: A system to authenticate users entering parking lots.
details: This project includes facial recognition and RFID-based authentication to ensure secure parking lot access.
